description:
At GDC, Arm launched ASR (Accuracy Super Resolution)—an upscaling technology promising to boost mobile gaming performance without compromising fidelity and battery life. For years, a fundamental challenge has plagued mobile game developers: how to strike the perfect balance between visuals and performance. Thanks to ASR, that difficult choice will be less of a problem. First... Read more »

The post Arm unleashes ASR upscaling to boost mobile gaming performance appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Arm unleashes ASR upscaling to boost mobile gaming performance
